Our Esteemed Faculty

Our team of dedicated and experienced educators is the backbone of our institution, committed to nurturing the next generation of leaders.

Suman Bisht
Principal, PhD in Education

Dr. Sharma has over 20 years of experience in educational leadership and curriculum development. She is passionate about fostering an inclusive and innovative learning environment.

Mr. Rohan Verma
Head of Mathematics, M.Sc. Mathematics

Mr. Verma is known for his engaging teaching style and ability to make complex mathematical concepts accessible to students of all levels. He has been with Himalaya Public School for 15 years.

Ms. Priya Kulkarni
Lead Science Teacher, M.Ed. Science Education

Ms. Kulkarni champions inquiry-based learning and hands-on experiments in her science classes. She actively mentors students for science olympiads and fairs.

Mr. Sameer Khan
English Department Head, MA English Literature

Mr. Khan inspires a love for literature and critical thinking. He organizes the school's debate club and annual literary festival.

Mrs. Sunita Patel
Arts & Crafts Coordinator, B.F.A.

Mrs. Patel believes in nurturing creativity and self-expression through various art forms. Her students regularly win accolades at inter-school art competitions.

Mr. Arjun Reddy
Physical Education Director, M.P.Ed.

Mr. Reddy is dedicated to promoting physical fitness and sportsmanship among students. He coaches multiple school sports teams, leading them to numerous victories.
